short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Colors all posts made by user in a thread

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it possible to identify the individual users in a thread.  When in a thread on 4chan you can click on the ID on the top of the post and all the posts by that ID will be colored a randomly generated color.  Click again to change the color if you don't like the first one.
